snippet: The Human Rights Council was preparing to call on Friday for an international inquiry into last week’s massacre of more than 100 Syrian civilians at Houla.

byline.original: By NICK CUMMING-BRUCE and NEIL MacFARQUHAR

lead_paragraph: The Human Rights Council was preparing to call on Friday for an international inquiry into last week’s massacre of more than 100 Syrian civilians at Houla.

headline.main: U.N. Rights Panel to Seek Access to Syria
